name: Chord
tagline: A peer-­to‐peer lookup service based on the paper - Chord: A scalable peer-to-peer lookup service for internet applications
body:
﻿# CHORD
- Implemented a peer-to-peer lookup service based on a popular research paper “Chord: A Scalable Peer-to-Peer
Lookup Service for Internet Applications”. 
- In particular, implemented distributed key lookup and distributed node join. 
- Reduced the number of messages that needs to be exchanged through piggybacking at each node.
